// client/src/components/Survey.js
import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import WebsiteDisplay from'./WebsiteDisplay';import QuestionForm from'./QuestionForm';import WelcomeSurvey from'./WelcomeSurvey';import FarewellScreen from'./FarewellScreen';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Survey(){const[sessionId,setSessionId]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[websites,setWebsites]=useState([]);const[websiteQuestions,setWebsiteQuestions]=useState([]);const[demographicQuestions,setDemographicQuestions]=useState([]);const[currentWebsiteIndex,setCurrentWebsiteIndex]=useState(0);const[showSurvey,setShowSurvey]=useState(false);const[viewStartTime,setViewStartTime]=useState(null);const[surveyStep,setSurveyStep]=useState('welcome');// 'welcome', 'websites', 'farewell'
useEffect(()=>{// Check if session exists in local storage
const storedSessionId=localStorage.getItem('surveySessionId');if(storedSessionId){setSessionId(storedSessionId);fetchSurveyData(storedSessionId);}else{startNewSession();}},[]);const startNewSession=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const response=await axios.get(`/api/survey/start`);const{sessionId}=response.data;// Store session ID in local storage
localStorage.setItem('surveySessionId',sessionId);setSessionId(sessionId);fetchSurveyData(sessionId);}catch(err){setError('Kunne ikke starte spørgeskemaet. Prøv venligst igen.');setLoading(false);}};const fetchSurveyData=async id=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`/api/survey/questions/${id}`);setWebsites(response.data.websites);setWebsiteQuestions(response.data.websiteQuestions);setDemographicQuestions(response.data.demographicQuestions);setLoading(false);}catch(err){setError('Kunne ikke indlæse spørgeskemadata. Prøv venligst igen.');setLoading(false);}};const handleDemographicsComplete=()=>{setSurveyStep('websites');setViewStartTime(new Date());};const handleShowSurvey=()=>{setShowSurvey(true);};const handleSubmitAnswers=async answers=>{try{const viewEndTime=new Date();const viewTime=(viewEndTime-viewStartTime)/1000;// in seconds
const currentWebsite=websites[currentWebsiteIndex];await axios.post(`/api/survey/submit/${sessionId}`,{websiteId:currentWebsite['@_id'],answers,viewTime});// Move to next website or complete survey
if(currentWebsiteIndex<websites.length-1){setCurrentWebsiteIndex(currentWebsiteIndex+1);setShowSurvey(false);setViewStartTime(new Date());}else{setSurveyStep('farewell');}}catch(err){setError('Kunne ikke indsende svar. Prøv venligst igen.');}};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Indl\xE6ser sp\xF8rgeskema..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error});}// Render different steps of the survey
if(surveyStep==='welcome'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WelcomeSurvey,{sessionId:sessionId,onComplete:handleDemographicsComplete,demographicQuestions:demographicQuestions});}if(surveyStep==='farewell'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FarewellScreen,{sessionId:sessionId});}// Website survey flow
const currentWebsite=websites[currentWebsiteIndex];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"survey-container",children:[!showSurvey?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"website-view",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WebsiteDisplay,{website:currentWebsite,onShowSurvey:handleShowSurvey})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"question-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Sp\xF8rgsm\xE5l om hjemmesiden"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuestionForm,{questions:websiteQuestions,onSubmit:handleSubmitAnswers})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress",children:["Hjemmeside ",currentWebsiteIndex+1," af ",websites.length]})]});}export default Survey;
